cons: Spearmint is possibly unsafe when used in excessive amounts during pregnancy.
Excessive use of spearmint might increase kidney damage.
description: It helps to protect your mouth and throat from infections, including those that can damage dental and gum health.
It can help to relieve sore throats and tightness in the chest, alleviating congestion and irritation.
It prevents chronic diseases, including cancer, many of which are caused by free radicals attacking healthy cells.
It helps to prevent atherosclerosis, strokes, and heart attacks.
